name: Merry Go Wrong - GGJ Entry
description:
*Global Game Jam 2020 Entry*

You're a technician tasked to repair a merry go 'round in an amusement park. However, the park's owner has become crazy and wants to run the attractions 24/7 at full speed. No time to stop for repairs so you better hurry and make sure the kids are safe !

How to play !

get in the carousel and don't fall off, try to fix the kid's rides by left clicking near them when they catch on fire and don't run out of stamina. You can refill it by left clicking while standing near the soda bar at the center of the attraction

Made in 48 hours by Antoine Rouard, Margot Delnaye, Thomas Steller and Calvin Klein

Known bugs : the player sometimes does not collide with the ground when leaving the carousel. The game sometimes crash at the end of level 2.

contact : ck63@live.fr

Welcome to GreedLand ! We hope you find some fun in our weird game jam entry <3
